com.heaton.bot
Class Attribute

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.heaton.bot.Attribute
Direct Known Subclasses:
AttributeList, HTMLForm.FormElement
public class Attribute
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable

The Attribute class stores a list of named value pairs. Optionally the value can have delimiters such as ' or ". Copyright 2001 by Jeff Heaton

Version:
1.0
Author:
Jeff Heaton
See Also:
AttributeList

Constructor Detail

Attribute

public Attribute(java.lang.String name,
                 java.lang.String value,
                 char delim)
Construct a new Attribute. The name, delim and value properties can be specified here.
Parameters:
name - The name of this attribute.
value - The value of this attribute.
delim - The delimiter character for the value. For example a " or '.

Attribute

public Attribute()
The default constructor. Construct a blank attribute.

value - The value of this attribute.
